description: Detects suspicious powershell process which includes bxor command, alternative obfuscation method to b64 encoded commands.
name: Suspicious XOR Encoded PowerShell Command Line
query: (((winlog.event_data.Description:"Windows\ PowerShell" OR Product:"PowerShell\ Core\ 6") AND process.command_line:(*bxor* OR *\-join\ * OR *\-join'* OR *\-join\"* OR *\-join`* OR *char*)) AND (NOT (process.parent.executable:"C\:\\Program\ Files\\Amazon\\SSM\\ssm\-document\-worker.exe")))
author: Sami Ruohonen
Harish Segar (improvement)
Tim Shelton
